name: Brown Sugar and Cinnamon Rice Pudding
author: Jaja Million
summary: This rice pudding is tasty and a very easy to make for breakfast or dessert. It is also gluten-free.
ingredients: 2 cups instant white rice (such as Minute®)
2 tablespoons brown sugar, or to taste
½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, or more to taste
directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan
Stir rice, butter, and salt into water until the butter melts
Cover saucepan and remove from heat
Set aside until water is absorbed, about 5 minutes
Stir milk, brown sugar, cornstarch, and vanilla extract into the rice; bring to a simmer over medium heat while stirring; cook until the rice has the consistency of loose oatmeal, about 5 minutes
Ladle pudding into bowls and dust with cinnamon
